title: Since updating to android 10 my Pixel 3 screen always goes black during a call.
content:
This happens even before I put my phone up to my face. It does not have to do with the approx sensor. Only after the call is over and I press the power button a few times (also fingerprint reader) does the screen come back on.
I had no problems yesterday (or since I have had the phone). The problems started after the update from Android pie to 10 (Q).
Is there a solution for this problem?
I have also started the phone in "safe mode", so that the chances of third party apps being the problem is reduced. Unfortunately this has also been of no help.
